brain waves beanie adult playin hooky designs worsted 4 yarn i-5 50mm hook sizes written kids adult adult large r10 & r16 r22 chain 1 skip same st work * 1 single_crochet in each of the next 3 sts do notes not work in same st on 1st repeat 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts 1 double_crochet in each of the next 4 sts 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts repeat from * to end join to 1st single_crochet 66 r11 & r17 chain 1 work 1 single_crochet in same st 1 single_crochet in each of the next 2 single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 half_double_crochet 1 double_crochet in each of the next 4 double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 half_double_crochet * 1 single_crochet in each of the next 3 single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 half_double_crochet 1 double_crochet in each of the next 4 double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 half_double_crochet repeat from * to end join to 1st single_crochet 66 r12 & r18 accent row chain 1 work 1 single_crochet in same st & in each st to end join to 1st single_crochet 66 r13 & r19 chain 2 work 1 double_crochet in each of the next 3 sts 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts 1 single_crochet in each of the next 3 sts 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts * 1 double_crochet in each of the next 4 sts 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts 1 single_crochet in each of the next 3 sts 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts repeat from * to end join to top of beg chain 2 66 r14 & r20 chain 2 work 1 double_crochet in each of the next 3 double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 half_double_crochet 1 single_crochet in each of the next 3 single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 half_double_crochet * 1 double_crochet in each of the next 4 double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 half_double_crochet 1 single_crochet in each of the next 3 single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 half_double_crochet repeat from * to end join to top of beg chain 2 66 r15 & r21 accent row chain 1 work 1 single_crochet in same st & in each st
